description: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of Intermediate Supply Specialists to support and assist in the warehousing and handling of goods.
full_summary:
## Supply Specialists - Request for Proposal 
**Contract Reference:** WS3734553359-Doc3735500055

**Publication Date:** November 4, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** December 2, 2022, 2:00 p.m. EST

**Amendment Number:** 2

## Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking the services of Intermediate Supply Specialists to support and assist in the warehousing and handling of goods. The required services include administration of various supply-related activities and will be provided directly to and in support of DND operations.

## Contract Details
* **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence
* **End User Entity Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

## Trade Agreements
This contract is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

## Tender Requirements
* **Proposal Submission:** Interested suppliers must submit their proposals in accordance with the instructions provided in the tender documents.
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Proposals will be evaluated based on the Lowest Price.
* **Closing Time:** All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2:00 p.m. EST on December 2, 2022.

## Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
Patrick Semple, Department of Public Works and Government Services
Email: [patrick.semple@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:patrick.semple@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) 
Note: Include any relevant notes or attachments in the feedback.

Link to tender documents: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14550489

Word count: 292 
Available space: 108 WCS 

This is the rewritten version
